content: अप {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} [न पाति रक्षति पतनात् पा-ड <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} (As a prefix to verbs it means) ({%a%}) Away, away from, denoting वियोग; अपयाति, अपनयति; ({%b%}) deterioration (विकृति); अपकरोति does wrongly or badly; ({%c%}) opposition, negation, contradiction (विपरीत); अपकर्षति, अपचिनोति; ({%d%}) direction or mention or illustration (निदर्शन); अपादिशति; ({%e%}) exclusion (वर्जन); अपवह्, अपसृ {%<ab>caus.</ab>%}; ({%f%}) joy, merriment or laughter (आनद); अपहसति; ({%g%}) concealment or denial (चौर्य); अपलपति, अपवदते. {@--2@} As first member of <ab>Tat.</ab> or Bahuvrīhi <ab>comp.</ab> it has all the above senses; अपयानं, अपकर्म, अपपाठः; अपशब्दः a bad or corrupt word; °भी fearless; °कल्मष stainless; अपरागः discontent (<ab>opp.</ab> to अनुराग); °मेघोदयं वर्षं <ls>Ku. 6. 54</ls> &c. In most cases अप may be translated by ‘bad’, ‘inferior’, ‘corrupt,’ ‘wrong’, unworthy’ &c. It also means ‘going downwards’ as in अपानः. {@--3@} As a separable preposition (with a noun in the <ab>abl.</ab>) ({%a%}) away from; यत्संप्रत्यप लोकेभ्यो लंकायां वसतिर्भयात् Rām; ({%b%}) without, on the outside of; अप हरेः संसारः <ls>Sk.</ls>; ({%c%}) with the exception of, excepting; अप त्रिगर्तेभ्यो वृष्टो देवः <ls>Sk.</ls> on the outside of, with the exception of. In these senses अप may form adverbial compounds also (<ls>P. II. 1. 12</ls>); °विष्णु संसारः <ls>Sk.</ls> without Viṣṇu; °त्रिगर्तं वृष्टो देवः excepting T. &c. It also implies negation, contradiction &c.; °कामं °शंकं. The senses of this word as given by <ls>G. M.</ls> may be thus put in verse; वर्जने विकृतौ चौर्ये विपरीतवियोगयोः . अपकृष्टे च निर्देशे हर्षे चापः प्रयुज्यते. [<ab>cf.</ab> <ab>L.</ab> {%ab%}; <ab>Gr.</ab> {%apo%}; <ab>Goth.</ab> {%af%}. <ab>Eng.</ab> {%of or off%}; Zend {%apa%}].
